English: to move to a new place
to pack things in moving boxes
hungarian: csomagolja be a dolgokat költöztető dobozokba

English: to ask for bids for moving services
I'm looking for a new place to live.
I would like to move to another city.
I would like to move to a new apartment.
I would like to move to a bigger apartment.

Finnish: Minun nykyinen asuntoni on liian pieni.
English: My current apartment is too small.

Finnish: Haluan muuttaa niin pian kuin mahdollista.
English: I want to move as soon as possible.
I'd like a more spacious apartment
I'd like to rent a large 3-room apartment.
I'd like to buy an apartment.
I'd like to buy a detached house.
I'd like to sell my apartment.
I'd like to find a new tenant.

Finnish: Meillä ei ole varaa ostaa asuntoa.
English: We can't afford to buy an apartment.
hungarian: Nem engedhetjük meg magunknak, hogy házat vegyünk.

English: I moved to Finland last year.
I moved for family reasons (e.g. divorce).
My previous apartment was too small.
hungarian: Az előző lakásom túl kicsi volt.

English: Our previous apartment was too large.
hungarian: Az előző lakásunk túl nagy volt.

English: I want to move closer to my place of work.
I wanted to live closer to the city center.
I have to pack all my things.
Where can I rent moving boxes?
I fetched banana boxes from the store.
hungarian: Felvettem a banános dobozokat a boltban.

English: I wrap the wine glasses in newspapers.
I close the boxes with packing tape.
I mark what's inside the box with a marker.
hungarian: Jelölővel megjelölöm, hogy mit tartalmaz a doboz.

English: In which box is the cutlery?
Did you already pack the glasses?
Carry that box to the bathroom!
I want to book a moving-out cleaning.
I'm taking care of the moving-out cleaning myself.
Do you need help in the move?
Our moving day is the last day of the month.
hungarian: Költözési napunk a hónap utolsó napja.

English: You don't happen to have a trailer, do you?
